product_name: Maui Jim Breakers Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Perfect for driving or relaxing on the beach, the Maui Jim Breakers Polarized Sunglasses offer incredible comfort and classic aviator style in a lightweight design. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Matte Black frames feature gray-tint Neutral Grey lenses that offer rich color and contrast; they're perfect for especially bright, direct sunlight. Matte Tortoise frames feature bronze-tint HCL(R) Bronze lenses that provide excellent contrast in variable conditions, from full sun to overcast. High-grade injected nylon frames are lightweight and tough, with superior fit and comfort. Embedded rubber nosepads; anti-corrosive spring hinges. The Maui Jim Breakers Polarized Sunglasses feature a modified aviator shape that compliments round, oval or oblong faces.
short_description: Perfect for driving or relaxing on the beach, the Maui Jim Breakers Polarized Sunglasses offer incredible comfort and classic aviator style in a lightweight design.
